alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Hancock; Henry; Johnson; Marion; Rush; Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 01 at 12:00AM EDT until April 01 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM EDT FOR SHELBY...SOUTHERN HANCOCK...WESTERN RUSH...NORTHERN DECATUR... EASTERN JOHNSON...SOUTHWESTERN HENRY AND SOUTHEASTERN MARION COUNTIES... At 1200 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Greenfield to near Shelbyville to 9 miles east of Franklin, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Morristown, Manilla, Arlington, St. Paul, Carthage, Rushville, Knightstown and Moscow. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for central and east central Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Decatur; Hancock; Henry; Johnson; Marion; Rush; Shelby
